nodes.text: The Riot Control Walker was a modified All Terrain Scout Transport that seated a single stormtrooper of the Galactic Empire who operated the vehicle from atop its body. The walker was armed with twin forward-facing laser cannons, with one installed at each side of the ground vehicle. From the walker's seat, the pilot could manipulate each laser cannon individually, rotating the ranged weapon to point downwards and upwards to strike both airborne and ground targets.

The Riot Control Walker was first included as a LEGO toy set released in 2017 as merchandise for the film Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. The set's package cover depicts a Riot Control Walker piloted by a stormtrooper and firing in a ruined settlement alongside a stormtrooper and a pair of death troopers. The walker later appeared in Playdemic's 2020 mobile game LEGO Star Wars Battles, where it was first identified.
